name: TM4C ARM® Cortex®-M4F MCU
description:
Texas Instruments' TM4C12x MCUs offer the industry’s popular ARM® Cortex®-M4F core with scalable memory and package options, unparalleled connectivity peripherals, advanced application functions, industry-leading analog integration, and extensive software solutions. In addition, Texas Instruments offers a complete solution to get to market quickly, with evaluation and development boards, white papers, application notes, an easy-to-use peripheral driver library, and a strong support, sales, and distributor network.

For more information, go to TM4C12x MCUs.


LaunchPad, BoosterPack, and TivaWare are trademarks of Texas Instruments.
ARM and Cortex are registered trademarks of ARM Limited.
microSD is a registered trademark of SD-3C, LLC.
